bibl.title: The Meroitic Collection from Faras in the National Museum in Warsaw. History of the Collection.

bibl.author: KOCIANKOWSKA-BOŻEK, Joanna

bibl.note: See pp. 94-95: Stelae. Mentions one Greek stela. "The one line of Greek inscription is not very clear."
KOCIANKOWSKA-BOŻEK Joanna, The Meroitic Collection from Faras in the National Museum in Warsaw. History of the Collection.
